title: Workmaster 25  I welded a quick attach plow first time out.

tasks.task: Set up and maintain a plow for clearing a parking lot.
subtasks: Welded a weld-on plate onto a plow blade.
Mounted the plow blade onto a quick hitch.
Attached angle cylinders to the plow for adjustment.
Ensured proper functioning of the plow's hydraulic system.
Operated the tractor to plow the parking lot.
Adjusted the plow's angle and angle cylinders as needed.
Maneuvered the tractor and plow around the parking lot.
Cleaned up minor damage to grass during plowing.

tasks.task: Address maintenance issues with the plow setup.
subtasks: Inspected welds for integrity after use.
Adjusted hanging hoses to improve plow functionality.
